extendedInfo.description: Pakistan TV provides:- Live Pakistani & Indian *Full Screen* TV - VOIP phone service for international calling - CCTV Security Camera monitoring- Live Events Streaming Pakistan TV partners with EBOUNDSERVICES.COM to provide you the following services:Pakistan TV is the only legal distributor of Internet TV content of Pakistan. Pak TV hosts its own streaming servers to provide you a better quality and reliable live TV & streaming services. Pakistan TV provides the VOIP phone service through its own phone switches and exchanges. Pak TV is committed to serve you the best phone voice quality and best rates for international calling.Pakistan TV hosts it own servers for CCTV Camera security monitoring. There is no comparision on the service quality, feature and rates. Pakistan TV provides a hosted service for streaming live events. The streaming solution is unique and innovative.------------------Pakistani / Pakistan TV Live channels available:Free TV Channels with Ads:-gawahi -khybernews -royaltv -city42 -nvibe -rex -atv -avtkhyber -suchtv -sindhnews -k2tv -arujtv -dhoomtv -waqtnews -channelfive -sohnidharti -aplus -healthtv -raahtv -sindhtv -emax -babytv -aajnews -pogo -rex -cartoonnetwork -ptvnews -express -sindhnews -testtv -zaiqa -vsh -starplus -sonysab -times -abbtakk -starcricket -aryentertainment -geoentertainment -dunya -nationalgeographic -jalwa -businessplus -sindhtv -animalplanet -cnbc -arynews -geotezz -colors -zeecinema -disney -lifetv -peacetv -sonytv -geonews -qtv -samaatv -urdu1 -mecca -8xm -dawn -sonysix -nick -expressentertainment -starmovies -playtv -masalatv -satmax -discovery -emax - Other new channels are being added as part of the same package deal.

reviews.title: Huawei y300
reviews.comment: Pls add more channel work gr8...some channel like ptv ,star cricket worked not prop....add tensport.......

reviews.title: Used to be gud before new update.
reviews.comment: Used to be a good app.I preffered it over many other apps of same category.But now after new update there are lots of ads and nearly all channels except news channels are not even buffering.There are too many adds.plx fix it.
reviews.author: Samee Suhail

reviews.title: Sound and adverts
reviews.comment: Most of the channels are literally inaudible. As for the adverts, seriously how can you see the ticker with all those adverts? I feel like I\'m wasting my time even trying to watch TV using this app.
reviews.author: Usman Malik

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Application is So good since i am connect Network User and They are Using Ebound Services Tvchannels on Dodear . Its Working Great All Channels work Only Issue To many ads i mean i dont have to complain since its free App but Still Ads Placements are Very Bad and its Blocking the News Feeds on Every Channel its just sad Please Remove the ads From Bottom of New Feeds so i can see the Latest Feeds Running in Bottom..... Thanks Alot

reviews.title: ADS are very anoying
reviews.comment: Please do something about popup ADS  they are very annoying, please also add \"Hum TV\" world  overall this app is awesome !!!!
